comment:
Color: Copper
Clarity: Moderately clear, some haze
Head: White, Moderate to Light, minimal retention around the edges of the glass.
Aroma: Piney, resinous, caramel, mild metallic smell, some fruity esters, possibly some smell of cloves
Body: Medium
Carbonation: Good, per style
Balance: Slightly bitter with some harsh aftertaste
Overall: Not bad. Decent flavor profile, although slightly over bitter/harsh. Would be better with a cleaner aroma.
